Name: Dry Martini (2:1.5 ratio) Sopping Wet
Ingredients: 2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of chilled Fragata Green Olive on stick or lemon zest twist.
Review: Herbal vermouth flavours pervade this Sopping Wet Martini.
History: There is considerable debate about the origin of the Martini. See the Martini Cocktail And Its Evolution .
Nutrition: One serving of Dry Martini (2:1.5 ratio) Sopping Wet contains 185 calories
